issue.title: Making istream_iterator copy constructor trivial is an ABI break

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4892.

li.p: Modify the class synopsis in as indicated:

blockquote.p: -6- Remarks: If is_trivially_copy_constructible_v<T> is true, then this constructor is trivial. If the initializer T(x.value) in the declaration auto val = T(x.value); is a constant initializer ([expr.const]), then this constructor is a constexpr constructor.
